title: Comprehensive Testing
description: Performing thorough testing of all application features
notes: Test all core features in different browsers and environments
suggested_tests: Test in Chrome, Firefox, and Safari
Validate data persistence works as expected
Verify all user interactions work correctly
Test edge cases like empty polls, long question text, etc.

title: Mobile Responsiveness
description: Optimizing the application for various mobile device screen sizes
notes: Ensure the application provides a good user experience on smartphones and tablets
suggested_tests: Test on different screen sizes with the browser developer tools
Ensure text and UI elements are properly sized on small screens

title: Production Deployment
description: Deploying the application to a production environment
notes: Set up a production deployment pipeline and host the application in a publicly accessible environment
suggested_tests: Verify the application works correctly in the production environment
Ensure all features work consistently in the deployed version
